## isRemirrorExtension variable

Checks if this is a RemirrorExtension type. These are used to configure the extensions that determine the underlying behaviour of the editor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isRemirrorExtension: <GOptions extends {} = any>(value: unknown) => value is RemirrorElement<GOptions>
```
